[
    {"bad sentence": "Wow, the president just announced a new policy, wow!", "good sentence": "Wow! The president just announced a new policy."},
    {"bad sentence": "Impossible, the team won against all odds, impossible!", "good sentence": "Impossible! The team won against all odds."},
    {"bad sentence": "Unbelievable, the stock market just hit a record high, unbelievable!", "good sentence": "Unbelievable! The stock market just hit a record high."},
    {"bad sentence": "No, the court rejected the appeal, no!", "good sentence": "No! The court rejected the appeal."},
    {"bad sentence": "Yes, the new law has been passed, yes!", "good sentence": "Yes! The new law has been passed."},
    {"bad sentence": "Finally, the long-awaited museum opens, finally!", "good sentence": "Finally! The long-awaited museum opens."},
    {"bad sentence": "Sadly, the renowned artist passed away, sadly!", "good sentence": "Sadly! The renowned artist passed away."},
    {"bad sentence": "Amazing, the scientists discovered a new planet, amazing!", "good sentence": "Amazing! The scientists discovered a new planet."},
    {"bad sentence": "Fortunately, everyone survived the accident, fortunately!", "good sentence": "Fortunately! Everyone survived the accident."},
    {"bad sentence": "Seriously, the government is considering another lockdown, seriously!", "good sentence": "Seriously! The government is considering another lockdown."}
]

[
    {"bad sentence": "Scientists recently discovered that Element 118, also known as ununoctium, has unique properties.", "good sentence": "Scientists recently discovered that element 118, also known as oganesson, has unique properties."},

[
    {
        "bad sentence": "In his letter, the mayor wrote, 'Dear Citizens, I am pleased to announce the new park initiative. We will begin construction next month. Yours sincerely, Mayor Thompson.'",
        "good sentence": "In his letter, the mayor wrote:

'Dear Citizens,

I am pleased to announce the new park initiative.

We will begin construction next month.

Yours sincerely,
Mayor Thompson.'"
    },
    {
        "bad sentence": "The CEO's announcement stated, 'To All Employees, we have achieved our financial targets for the year. This success is all thanks to your hard work. Best, John Carter.'",
        "good sentence": "The CEO's announcement stated:

'To All Employees,

we have achieved our financial targets for the year.

This success is all thanks to your hard work.

Best,
John Carter.'"
    },
    {
        "bad sentence": "The whistleblower's letter revealed, 'Dear Committee, I wish to inform you of misconduct at our company. It is urgent we address this soon. Regards, Anonymous.'",
        "good sentence": "The whistleblower's letter revealed:

'Dear Committee,

I wish to inform you of misconduct at our company.

It is urgent we address this soon.

Regards,
Anonymous.'"
    },
    {
        "bad sentence": "In her resignation letter, she stated, 'To the Board, I hereby resign from my position. Thank you for the opportunities. Sincerely, Jane Doe.'",
        "good sentence": "In her resignation letter, she stated:

'To the Board,

I hereby resign from my position.

Thank you for the opportunities.

Sincerely,
Jane Doe.'"
    },
    {
        "bad sentence": "The scientist wrote in his letter, 'Dear Colleagues, our research has been successful. We should publish our findings soon. Best regards, Dr. Smith.'",
        "good sentence": "The scientist wrote in his letter:

'Dear Colleagues,

our research has been successful.

We should publish our findings soon.

Best regards,
Dr. Smith.'"
    },
    {
        "bad sentence": "The principal's letter stated, 'To Parents and Students, school will be closed tomorrow due to weather conditions. Please stay safe. Warm regards, Principal Lee.'",
        "good sentence": "The principal's letter stated:

'To Parents and Students,

school will be closed tomorrow due to weather conditions.

Please stay safe.

Warm regards,
Principal Lee.'"
    },
    {
        "bad sentence": "The artist wrote, 'Dear Fans, I am excited to launch my new album next month. Hope to see you at the release party! Cheers, Emily.'",
        "good sentence": "The artist wrote:

'Dear Fans,

I am excited to launch my new album next month.

Hope to see you at the release party!

Cheers,
Emily.'"
    },
    {
        "bad sentence": "The activist's letter stated, 'Dear Supporters, we must rally together now more than ever. Our cause needs us. Yours, Tom.'",
        "good sentence": "The activist's letter stated:

'Dear Supporters,

we must rally together now more than ever.

Our cause needs us.

Yours,
Tom.'"
    },
    {
        "bad sentence": "The director's note read, 'To the Cast and Crew, great job on the opening night. Your efforts are truly appreciated. Regards, Director Stevens.'",
        "good sentence": "The director's note read:

'To the Cast and Crew,

great job on the opening night.

Your efforts are truly appreciated.

Regards,
Director Stevens.'"
    },
    {
        "bad sentence": "Her letter of appeal mentioned, 'Dear Community Members, I seek your support for my campaign. Together, we can make a difference. Thank you, Sarah.'",
        "good sentence": "Her letter of appeal mentioned:

'Dear Community Members,

I seek your support for my campaign.

Together, we can make a difference.

Thank you,
Sarah.'"
    }
]
